page.title: 20JOBS (GOLLANFIELD)
page.content: Here are some different{jobs}that our parents do. Morag's mother is the only person that works in the{D block.}She works as a cleaner.Most of the{jobs}in our{D {block}are connected with{farming. Ross's father works as a{trucker}for {J&W Henderson}in{Inverness. Jason's father owns two{garages,R&E {Henderson}in{Nairn. Paul's dad works at{Mcdermotts}as an{engineer. John's father is a head{chef}at the {golf View Hotel}and his mother works as a{secretary}for{Esso. Andrea's mother works for{Mcderm - {otts}and at the{Chicken House. Marie's father works for{Mcdermotts as a{fitter}and Marie's mother works in{Culloden Pottery.} My father works as a{chief}of clerks for{Fort George.
